text: The Millionaires' Mile, Millionaire's Mile, Millionaires' Row, Millionaire's Row or Alpha Street is a term referring to exclusive residential neighborhoods of various towns. They are often located alone on a strip such as a riverside or a hilltop drive. They can also be located at a wide town boulevard. ==Examples== ===USA=== * Newport, Rhode Island: Bellevue Avenue == References == Category:Neighborhoods
title: Millionaires' Mile
